form.label: SH - 07 - Calculated Fields / Field Extractions & Transformations / Field Aliases - Dashboard - v3.0.7
form.description: Splunk Calculated Fields, Field Extractions/Transformations and Field Aliases Dashboard

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_data_props_calcfields_sh_kv_store_lookup | fields _time shcluster_label Splunk_Instance app sharing stanza name value author updated acl_perms_read acl_perms_write acl_removable | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info_simple(shcluster_label,author)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | fillnull value="Undefined" Splunk_Instance Splunk_Roles app sharing stanza name value author | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles$" app="$app$" author="$author$" name="$name$" stanza="$stanza$" stanza="*$stanza2$*" emp_name="$emp_name$" emp_title="$emp_title$" emp_lob1="$emp_lob1$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" sharing="$sharing$" acl_removable=$acl_removable$

| from lookup:splunk_rest_data_props_extractions_sh_kv_store_lookup | fields _time shcluster_label Splunk_Instance app sharing stanza attribute value author type updated acl_perms_read acl_perms_write acl_removable | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info_simple(shcluster_label,author)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | makemv delim="," value | mvexpand value | eval value=trim(value) | lookup splunk_rest_data_transforms_extractions_sh_kv_store_lookup shcluster_label app title as value OUTPUTNEW FORMAT REGEX DELIMS CLEAN_KEYS DEST_KEY FIELDS MV_ADD REPEAT_MATCH SOURCE_KEY WRITE_META | eval Transform_Type = case(match(attribute, "^REPORT"), "REPORT", match(attribute, "^EXTRACT"), "EXTRACT", true(), attribute) | rex field=attribute mode=sed "s/^REPORT-|^EXTRACT-//g" | fillnull value="Undefined" Splunk_Instance app sharing stanza attribute value author type Type FORMAT REGEX DELIMS CLEAN_KEYS DEST_KEY FIELDS MV_ADD REPEAT_MATCH SOURCE_KEY WRITE_META | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles$" app="$app$" author="$author$" attribute="$attribute$" type="$type$" stanza="$stanza$" stanza="*$stanza2$*" emp_name="$emp_name$" emp_title="$emp_title$" emp_lob1="$emp_lob1$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" sharing="$sharing$" Transform_Type="$Transform_Type$" acl_removable=$acl_removable$

| from lookup:splunk_rest_data_props_fieldaliases_sh_kv_store_lookup | fields _time shcluster_label Splunk_Instance app author stanza attribute value sharing updated acl_perms_read acl_perms_write acl_removable | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info_simple(shcluster_label,author)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | rex field=attribute mode=sed "s/FIELDALIAS-//g" | fillnull value="Undefined" Splunk_Instance Splunk_Roles app author stanza attribute value sharing | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles$" app="$app$" author="$author$" attribute="$attribute$" stanza="$stanza$" stanza="*$stanza2$*" emp_name="$emp_name$" emp_title="$emp_title$" emp_lob1="$emp_lob1$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" sharing="$sharing$" acl_removable=$acl_removable$

html.h1: SH - 07 - Calculated Fields / Field Extractions & Transformations / Field Aliases - Dashboard - v1 (Updated: Jan 31, 2021)

search.query: | table shcluster_label app sharing acl_perms_read acl_perms_write acl_removable stanza name value author updated emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_cc emp_type emp_status endDate | sort 0 shcluster_label app stanza name | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_rest_fields` | rename name AS "Calculated Field"

li.a: Splunk Calculated Fields (EVAL-) Summary Index Gen Job From REST

search.query: | table shcluster_label app sharing acl_perms_read acl_perms_write acl_removable stanza attribute type Transform_Type updated value Type FORMAT REGEX DELIMS CLEAN_KEYS DEST_KEY FIELDS MV_ADD REPEAT_MATCH SOURCE_KEY WRITE_META author emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_cc emp_type emp_status endDate | sort 0 shcluster_label app stanza attribute | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_rest_fields` | rename type AS Type attribute AS "Field Extraction"

| inputlookup splunk_rest_data_transforms_extractions_sh_kv_store_lookup | search shcluster_label=$shcluster_label$ app=$app$ Splunk_Instance=$Splunk_Instance$ | table shcluster_label title disabled Type app author FORMAT REGEX DELIMS CLEAN_KEYS DEST_KEY FIELDS MV_ADD REPEAT_MATCH SOURCE_KEY WRITE_META sharing updated acl_perms_read acl_removable acl_perms_write | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_rest_fields`

search.query: | table shcluster_label app sharing acl_perms_read acl_perms_write acl_removable stanza attribute value author updated emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_cc emp_type emp_status endDate | sort 0 shcluster_label app stanza attribute | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_rest_fields` | rename attribute AS "Field Alias"

search.query: | stats count by _time | fields _time | `strftime_format(_time)` | rename _time As "Calculated Fields Latest Refresh"
| stats count by _time | fields _time | `strftime_format(_time)` | rename _time As "Field Extractions Latest Refresh"
